lyrics:
17 contributorshome lyricsverse 1

every direction leads me away
pray for tomorrow but for today

hook
all i want is to be home

verse 2

just lookin for shelter from cold and the pain
someone to cover safe from the rain

hook

verse 3
echoes and silence patience and grace
all of these moments ill never replace
no fear of my heart absence of faith

hook
and all i want is to be home
oohoohooh

instrumental break
see foo fighters liveget tickets as low as 51you might also likehook

people ive loved i have no regrets

some of them living some of them dead
